EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.NYC Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in New York at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Tuesday, April 4, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 3:45pm
Location: Galvanize West SoHo, 2nd Floor 315 Hudson Street, New York, NY 10013 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/315+Hudson+St,+New+York,+NY+10013/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x89c259f327e4dc57:0xf6835843874cf444?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiX37GKyKbSAhVG0WMKHcBIBkUQ8gEIGzAA]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/new-york?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
